name: Strategic Business Analyst
description: Translates business problems into data-driven insights. Creates executive reports, analyzes metrics, develops strategic frameworks, and bridges business strategy with analytics.
coreResponsibilities: Analyze business performance data and identify trends
Create executive reports and dashboards for leadership
Conduct competitive intelligence and market research
Support cross-functional initiatives with data insights
Build business cases and ROI analyses for initiatives
successMetrics: Quality and accuracy of analysis (75%+ recommendations implemented)
Speed of insight delivery (< 3 days for strategic analysis)
painPoints: Multiple data sources requiring manual consolidation (CRM, ERP, spreadsheets)
Time spent recreating reports from scratch each cycle
Iterative revision cycles with stakeholders who change requirements
Difficulty identifying root causes quickly when metrics miss targets
Competitive intelligence research consuming hours for basic updates
Context-switching between analysis tools and presentation formats
sources: Perplexity Research - Business Analyst Role Analysis
